title: Thanks for the Galio changes.
body: Now I no longer have to build the horrible AP build anymore and be squishy as fuck. Now I can finally build the full tank Galio again. The Galio that everybody loved.

replies.body: wut.... they removed a mr scaling bit to add more damage into Q. The base damge buff also got a base damage nerf on tornado. Thus you need to build ap still. if anything tank galio took a hit.
